Philippine: New People's Army (NPA) is formally organized by Bernabe Buscayno (alias Kumander Dante) of PKP as the military arm of the CPP, upon merger with Jose Maria Sison's army.
Tuguegarao City, Cagayan experienced heat at 42.2 degrees Celsius, the country's highest temperature ever recorded.
U.S. President Richard Nixon visits the Philippines.
Miss Philippines Gloria Diaz was crowned Miss Universe 1969.
Cultural Center of the Philippines in Manila inaugurated.
DZKB-TV Channel 9 of newly-established Kanlaon Broadcasting System (KBS), now Radio Philippines Network (RPN), begins its broadcast.
Marcos re-elected President of the Republic of the Philippines (second term).
